thread.title: Union Activists Storm Air France Office Over Job Cuts
thread.title_full: Union Activists Storm Air France Office Over Job Cuts

author: Susie Madrak
title: Union Activists Storm Air France Office Over Job Cuts
text:
sharethis 10/05/15 11:52am Union activists protesting proposed layoffs have stormed the headquarters of Air France during a meeting about job cuts at Charles de Gaulle airport in Paris. The protesters on Monday scaled a fence before zeroing in on two managers who had their shirts torn from their bodies.The men who were attacked fled under police protection.
